creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his family and friends
description: circular wine coaster with turned wood base, reeded lip; sides engraved with wriggle work bands and floral entwined reeding; fully marked on lower edge of exterior; one with obscured maker's mark
markings:
Marks

Each fully marked on rim of base (maker\'s mark badly rubbed on .1).
object_name: Wine coaster, one of a pair
title: Wine coaster, one of a pair
